description:
Responsible for the human resources work of the US office, including recruitment, employee onboarding and offboarding procedures, job transfers, and related paperwork; Responsible for the atmosphere of the US team, plan and execute various employee care activities according to employee needs and corporate culture; Responsible for the office environment of the US office, ensure timely and effective support and maintenance for daily operations, provide a comfortable working environment for employees; Perform other tasks as assigned by the leadership


Requirements

  • Have more than 5 years of local human resources and administrative work experience in the United States, familiar with US human resource management and office environment construction-related laws and regulations;
  • Integrity and optimism, good interpersonal communication and coordination ability, can create a positive work atmosphere for the team;
  • Strong stress resistance, can adapt to high-intensity work pressure, and also have outstanding execution ability to ensure efficient work;
  • Fluent in Mandarin, good listening, speaking, reading and writing skills, can effectively carry out cross-cultural communication
